featured.text: It is where the glacier runs to the lake.

definition.zh_def: 冰川，指的是由壓縮的雪和冰形成的大型冰體，通常在山區或極地地區存在。
definition.en_def: A glacier is a large mass of ice formed from compressed snow, typically found in mountainous or polar regions.
definition.example: The glacier slowly moved down the valley, carving the landscape over thousands of years.
